stories.text:
I've been looking at cryptocurrencies that add (more) value to society through their proof of work/stake mechanisms. Currently I found FoldingCoin[0] and CureCoin[1], but I cant seem to work out what the difference between the two is.

Is one of these particularly better?

Are there other likeminded currencies that are easily mined?

There's also SolarCoin[2], however it requires installing solar panels to mine.

[0] https://foldingcoin.net/

[1] https://curecoin.net/

[2] https://solarcoin.org/
stories.title: Ask HN: Best Cryptocurrency with (More of) a Purpose

stories.text:
It's driving me crazy. Around the time The Social Dilemma came out someone in a random thread linked a Google sheet with everything advertisers collected about you as a person, religion, sex, preferences, income, location, etc.

I swear it was this one and it was removed. https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=24468533

Is anyone able to help me out? I'd like to convince someone why their privacy should matter.
stories.title: Ask HN: Can someone direct me to a list of characteristics advertisers collect?

stories.text:
I am really curious who is the founder of fmovies, 123movies etc.

Is these websites run by same person/organisations?

There are lots of dupe of each site but all of them update same content immediately.

How this business work and where can I learn more about this?
stories.title: Ask HN: Who is the founder of fmovies, 123movies Piracy websites?
Binary pan-cancer distinct classes defined by YAP/TEAD activity

stories.text:
Hi, I graduated from an enginnering school since 10 months now. I have had a job as a fullstack dev just after graduation in small company where the main activity is (solutions integrator) So I'm the only Dev in there.

I like the work environment, but my main problem is that I feel that I need a superior who knows well about programming and who can help me out when facing some bugs or critical questions. Since I've started I've been working with several programming languages dependng on customers proposals. I don't like that because I'm not being good at any of them. Because I don't have the time needed to learn that programminglanguage and all technologies around it. I don't know if I have to keep with the company or not. What are the advantages and the drawbacks of staying in this company. Sorry my bad english.
stories.title: The Choice
